scripts.name: Test python - 10/13/2025, 1:44:59 PM
scripts.code:
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from selenium.webdriver.support.ui import WebDriverWait
from selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC
from selenium.webdriver.support.select import Select
import time

# Initialize Chrome WebDriver with options
options = webdriver.ChromeOptions()
options.add_argument('--start-maximized')
options.add_argument('--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled')

driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options)
driver.implicitly_wait(10)  # Implicit wait for all elements

try:
    # Base URL: https://practicetestautomation.com

    # Step 1: Navigate to the login page
    driver.get("/practice-test-login/")
    time.sleep(1)  # Wait for page load

    # Step 2: Wait for the username field to be present
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.ID, "username"))
    )

    # Step 3: Click on the username field
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "username"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    # Step 4: Type 'student' into the username field
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.presence_of_element_located((By.ID, "username"))
    )
    element.clear()
    element.send_keys("student")

    # Step 5: Wait for the password field to be present
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.ID, "password"))
    )

    # Step 6: Click on the password field
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "password"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    # Step 7: Type 'password123' into the password field
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.presence_of_element_located((By.ID, "password"))
    )
    element.clear()
    element.send_keys("password123")

    # Step 8: Wait for the submit button to be present
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.ID, "submit"))
    )

    # Step 9: Click the submit button for the first login attempt
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "submit"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    # Step 10: Wait for the username field to be present for the second attempt (assuming login failed or page reloaded)
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.ID, "username"))
    )

    # Step 11: Click on the username field for the second attempt
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "username"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    # Step 12: Type 'student' into the username field for the second attempt
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.presence_of_element_located((By.ID, "username"))
    )
    element.clear()
    element.send_keys("student")

    # Step 13: Wait for the password field to be present for the second attempt
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.ID, "password"))
    )

    # Step 14: Click on the password field for the second attempt
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "password"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    # Step 15: Type 'Password123' (case-sensitive) into the password field for the second attempt
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.presence_of_element_located((By.ID, "password"))
    )
    element.clear()
    element.send_keys("Password123")

    # Step 16: Wait for the 'login' button to be present
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.ID, "login"))
    )

    # Step 17: Click the 'login' button for the second attempt
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "login"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    # Step 18: Wait for the submit button to be present (after clicking 'login' button)
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.ID, "submit"))
    )

    # Step 19: Click the submit button (as requested, after clicking 'login')
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "submit"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    # Step 20: Wait for the 'Log out' link to appear, indicating successful login
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.visibility_of_element_located((By.LINK_TEXT, "Log out"))
    )

    # Step 21: Click the 'Log out' link
    element = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.LINK_TEXT, "Log out"))
    )
    driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView(true);", element)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    element.click()

    print("✓ Test completed successfully!")
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f"✗ Test failed: {str(e)}")
    driver.save_screenshot("error_screenshot.png")
    raise
    
finally:
    driver.quit()
